title: PBE Error

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I am getting an error page when I check for my PBE status. I took a screenshot of the whole page and attached it to this comment. 

I am unsure of my current status and get a repeating message upon checking the status at https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup. Hopefully you can shed some light on it.

replies.body: It looks like we've been having some issues with the PBE signup page today. We're still working on getting that page ironed out, but in the meantime we can try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4l9Anhit,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-04T02:21:00.735+0000)
>
> It looks like we've been having some issues with the PBE signup page today. We're still working on getting that page ironed out, but in the meantime we can try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps.

I used chrome and firefox and ran into the same problem, even after clearing history and cookies on both. Oh well. Thanks for the response.
